full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title: Individual Affairs Branch (IAB)

#### Tender Reference: cb-29-6677164

#### Publication Date: October 24, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date: November 15, 2023 4:00 p.m. EST

#### Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

The **Individual Affairs Branch (IAB)** of Indigenous Services Canada issues the following Request for Proposal (RFP) notice for Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) with a GSIN of D302A ADP SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT SERVICES.

**Scope of Work**

The IAB is seeking a qualified service provider to provide TBIPS in support of various tasks and projects.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The selection criteria for this RFP will be based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. Proposals will be evaluated using a two-stage process: shortlisting and evaluation.

**Eligibility**

This procurement requires involvement of the following Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Important Dates**

* Tender Submission Deadline: November 15, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023

For more information, please refer to the document attached below:

* [TBIPS NPP Open Bid Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22990/tbips_npp_open_1.pdf) 

For any inquiries, please contact: Vanessa Demers-Lamothe, vanessa.demers-lamothe@sac-isc.gc.ca, (000) 000-0000.
